titles.title: Prairie du Rocher French Colonial National Historical Park Establishment Act
Prairie du Rocher French Colonial National Historical Park Establishment Act
A bill to establish the Prairie du Rocher French Colonial National Historical Park in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Prairie du Rocher French Colonial National Historical Park Establishment Act
This bill establishes the Prairie du Rocher French Colonial National Historical Park in Illinois.
The Department of the Interior may construct or lease space to operate and maintain an interpretive center for the park.
